nodes.text: During the Battle of Jakku in 5 ABY, the Zabrak Jas Emari formed a crew of bounty hunters. The crew consisted of Emari, Jeeta, Embo, and Dengar, who all joined after they turned against Mercurial Swift. Thanks to Sinjir Rath Velus, Emari was able to secure full pardons as well as money for the trio, which convinced them to not kill her and remain formed up as a crew.
